name: Close Ranks
description:
You fight best with your back to a comrade and your eyes on the line.

While you and at least one ally are adjacent, you and all adjacent allies gain +1 Defense.

Describe how you form up.

improvements.name: Hold The Line
improvements.description: When you or any of your adjacent allies is attacked, all of you may contribute engagement dice to the engagement (just the dice - not engagement success options).

improvements.name: Shield Wall
improvements.description: If you and your adjacent allies are all wielding shields, all of you automatically win any engagements you enter as defenders - no rolls needed.
